content.prompt: The map above shows which of the following about luxury shops in seventeenth-century Madrid?

choices.label: Each street had an assortment of different types of shop.
Nobles living in the central square seldom bought jewelry.
Merchants selling similar goods grouped their shops next to one another.
The most profitable shops were located on the central square.
The great majority of shops sold clothing.
